name: Aggregate:Basic
query: select * from `films`

name: Aggregate:Basic limit
query: select * from `films` limit 10

name: Aggregate:Basic limit and offset
query: select * from `films` limit 10 offset 5

name: Aggregate:Basic with select
query: select Title,Rating from `films`

name: Aggregate:Select function
query: select abs(`Replacement Cost`) as aggr from `films`
select id,Title,Rating from `films` where abs(id)=1
select id,Title,Rating from `films` where abs(id)=1 or abs(id)=2
select id,Title,Rating from `films` where sum_Array((select id as total from customers),'total') =1
select `Replacement Cost` + 10 as aggr from `films`
select CEIL(`Replacement Cost`) as aggr from `films`
select `Replacement Cost` / 10 / 2 as aggr from `films`
select `Address.City` as City,avg(SIZE_OF_ARRAY(`Rentals`)) as AvgRentals from `customers` where `First Name` like 'm%' group by `Address.City`
select  `Address.Country` as Country,avg(SIZE_OF_ARRAY(`Rentals`)) as AvgRentals from `customers` where `First Name` like 'm%' group by `Country`
select  `Address.Country` as Country,`Address.City` as City,avg(SIZE_OF_ARRAY(`Rentals`)) as AvgRentals from `customers` where `First Name` like 'm%' group by `Address.Country`,`City`
select `Address.City` as City,abs(-1) as absId from `customers` where `First Name` like 'm%' and abs(-1) >=1

select `Address.City` as City,mod(`id`, 10) as modId,avg(SIZE_OF_ARRAY(`Rentals`)) as AvgRentals from `customers` where `First Name` like 'm%' and mod(`id`, 10)  > 1 group by `Address.City`,modId having AvgRentals > 2 order by `Address.City`,modId

select `Address.City` as City,mod(`id`, 10) as modId,avg(SIZE_OF_ARRAY(`Rentals`)) as AvgRentals from `customers` where `First Name` like 'm%' and mod(`id`, 10)  > 1 group by `Address.City`,modId having AvgRentals > 2 order by `City`,modId
select t as `$$ROOT` from (select id,`First Name`,`Last Name`,SIZE_OF_ARRAY(Rentals,'id')  as numRentals from customers) as t

name: Aggregate: Unwind
query: select id,`First Name`,unwind(Rentals) as Rental  from customers

name: Aggregate: Unwind
query: select id,`First Name`,unwind(Rentals) as Rentals  from customers
select id,`First Name`,unwind((select `Film Title` from Rentals)) as Rental  from customers
select (select id,`First Name` as Name) as t1, (select id,`Last Name` as LastName) as t2,MERGE_OBJECTS(t1,t2) as `$$ROOT`  from customers
select c.* from customers  as c
select c as `$$ROOT` from customers  as c
select sum(`id`) as aggrVal,`Address.City` as City  from `customers` group by `Address.City` order by `Address.City`
select avg(`id`) as aggrVal,`Address.City` as City  from `customers` group by `Address.City` order by `Address.City`
select min(`id`) as aggrVal,`Address.City` as City  from `customers` group by `Address.City` order by `Address.City`
select max(`id`) as aggrVal,`Address.City` as City  from `customers` group by `Address.City` order by `Address.City`
select count(*) as countVal,`Address.City` as City  from `customers` group by `Address.City` order by `Address.City`

name: Select sum case with values only
query: select sum(case when id <50 then 1 when id >= 50 then -1 else 0 end) as sumCase,`Address.City` as City from `customers` group by `Address.City`

name: Select sum case with fields and values
query: select sum(case when `Address.City`='Ueda' then 1 else 0 end) as Ueda,sum(case when `Address.City`='Tete' then 1 else 0 end) as Tete from `customers` group by `xxx`

name: Aggregate:Test Sum Case with field
query: select sum(case when `Address.City`='Ueda' then `id` else 0 end) as Ueda,sum(case when `Address.City`='Tete' then `id` else 0 end) as Tete from `customers` group by `xxx`

name: Aggregate:Test Sum Case with field and groupb by
query: select sum(case when `Address.City`='Ueda' then `id` else 0 end) as Ueda,sum(case when `Address.City`='Tete' then `id` else 0 end) as Tete from `customers` group by `xxx`

name: Aggregate:Functions in where
query: select `Address.City` as City,abs(`id`) as absId from `customers` where `First Name` like 'm%' and abs(`id`) > 1 order by absId

name: Aggregate:$$ROOT with subselect
query: select c as `$$ROOT`  from (select id,`First Name`,`Last Name`,SIZE_OF_ARRAY(Rentals) as RentalCnt from customers ) as c

name: Aggregate: *,function
query: select *,SIZE_OF_ARRAY(`Rentals`) as RentalsCount from `customers`

name: Aggregate: sub select with where
query: select x as '$$ROOT' from (select *,SIZE_OF_ARRAY(`Rentals`) as RentalsCount from `customers`) as x where `x`.`RentalsCount` > 20

name: Aggregate: sub select with where
query: select x as '$$ROOT' from (select *,SIZE_OF_ARRAY(`Rentals`) as RentalsCount from `customers`) as x where `x`.`RentalsCount` > 20

name: Aggregate: distinct
query: select distinct `First Name`,`Last Name` from customers

name: Aggregate: distinct with where
query: select distinct `First Name`,`Last Name` from customers where id<20

name: Aggregate: sum sum array
query: select sum(sum_array(Rentals,'filmId')) as s from customers

name: Aggregate: sum avg array
query: select sum(avg_array(Rentals,'filmId')) as s from customers

name: Aggregate: avg sum array
query: select avg(sum_array(Rentals,'filmId')) as s from customers

name: Aggregate: sum case
query: select sum(case when `Address.City`='Ueda' then 1 else 0 end) as Ueda,sum(case when `Address.City`='Tete' then 1 else 0 end) as Tete from `customers`

name: Aggregate: sum case
query: select Category,sum(case when `Address.City`='Ueda' then 1 else 0 end) as Ueda,sum(case when `Address.City`='Tete' then 1 else 0 end) as Tete from `customers` group by Category

name: Aggregate: sum auto group
query: select sum(filmId) as s from `customers`

name: Aggregate: count 1
query: select count(1) as s from `customers`

name: Aggregate: count *
query: select count(*) as s from `customers`

name: Aggregate: count 1 with group by
query: select col1,count(1) as s from `customers` group by col1

name: Aggregate: count 1 with group by
query: select col1,count(*) as s from `customers` group by col1

name: Aggregate: case is null
query:
select filmId,
                case
                    when col1 is not null
                    then col1
                    else 0
                end as "t0_0",
                case
                    when col2 is null
                    then 0
                    else 1
                end as "t1_0"
            from
            customers

name: Aggregate:strpos
query: select strpos(Title,'B') as x,* from films where strpos(Title,'B') > 1

name: Aggregate:fix alias
query: select f.Title,Description from films f where f.Name = "Test" and `Replacement Value` > 10

name: Aggregate:fix alias for sum
query: select filmId,(f.filmId + f.`Rental Duration` + 2) as val from films f where id>1

name: Aggregate:count distinct
query: select count(distinct Rating) as disCnt from films

name: Aggregate:count distinct complex aggregation
query: select Category,count(distinct Rating)  as cntDis,count(1)  as cnt,max(`Rental Duration`) as  maxDuration,min(`Rental Duration`) as  minDuration,sum(`Length`) as  sumLength,avg(`Length`) as avgLength from films group by Category

name: Aggregate:count distinct complex aggregation auto group
query: select count(distinct Rating)  as cntDis,count(1)  as cnt,max(`Rental Duration`) as  maxDuration,min(`Rental Duration`) as  minDuration,sum(`Length`) as  sumLength,avg(`Length`) as avgLength from films

name: Aggregate: with function expression
query: select max(`Length` + `Replacement Cost`) as totVal from films

name: Aggregate: sum case columns
query: select sum(case when `Length` > 0 then 1 else  `Rental Duration` end) as totVal from films

name: Aggregate: binary expression with aggregate functions auto group
query: select (max(`Length`) + max(`Replacement Cost`) + 1) * min(To_int(`Rental Duration`)) as totVal from films

name: Aggregate: binary expression with aggregate functions group
query: select Category,(max(`Length`) + sum(`Replacement Cost`) + 1) * min(To_int(`Rental Duration`)) as totVal from films group by Category

name: Aggregate: binary expression with aggregate functions group and count distinct
query: select Category,(count(distinct `Length`) + sum(`Replacement Cost`) + 1) * min(To_int(`Rental Duration`)) as totVal from films group by Category

name: Aggregate: binary expression with aggregate functions group and count distinct and sub select
query: select f.Category,(count(distinct f.`Length`) + sum(f.`Replacement Cost`) + 1) * min(To_int(f.`Rental Duration`)) as totVal from (select * from films) f group by f.Category

name: Aggregate: cast in where
query: select _.Title from films _ where cast(_.Length as double) = cast(83 as double)

name: Aggregate: case with strpos
query: select  _.Title from films _ where _.Rating = 'PG' and strpos((case when _.Category is not null  then _.Category  else '' end), 'Doc') = 1

name: Aggregate: case with project alias
query: select c.id,(case when ALL_ELEMENTS_TRUE(c.Rentals) then 'Yes' else 'No' end) as test from `customers` c

name: Aggregate: case with project and binary expression
query:
select _.Title,case
when cast(_.Length as double) - cast(_.`Replacement Cost` as double) is not null
then cast(_.Length as double) - cast(_.`Replacement Cost` as double)
when Length is not null
then Length
else _.`Replacement Cost`
end as SecondsDifference
from films _
